title:
Graph theoretic proofs for some results on banded inverses of
  $M$-matrices
abstract:
This work concerns results on conditions guaranteeing that certain banded
$M$-matrices have banded inverses. As a first goal, a graph theoretic
characterization for an off-diagonal entry of the inverse of an $M$-matrix to
be positive, is presented. This result, in turn, is used in providing
alternative graph theoretic proofs of the following: (1) a characterization for
a tridiagonal $M$-matrix to have a tridiagonal inverse. (2) a necessary
condition for an $M$-matrix to have a pentadiagonal inverse. The results are
illustrated by several numerical examples.
